revision.comment: [[User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 2 interwiki links, now provided by [[Wikipedia:Wikidata|Wikidata]] on [[d:q1207170]]
revision.text:
A '''hive''' may refer to a [[beehive]], an enclosed structure in which some honey bee species live and raise their young.
'''Hive''' may also refer to: __NOTOC__ ==Arts== * [[The Hives]], a Swedish rock band * [[Hive (record producer)]], a DJ and producer in the drum and bass music genre * [[Hive (game)]], an abstract-strategy board game published in 2001 * [[Hive Records]], a record label * [[H.I.V.E.]], a DC Comics villain organization * [[H.I.V.E. (series)|''H.I.V.E.'' (series)]], a series of children's books
==Business== * [[HIVE (ISP)]], an ISP in Iceland, founded in 2004
==Film and television== * [[The Hive (film)|''The Hive'' (film)]], a 2008 film * Hives, a 2012 [[anthology film]] consisting of five episodes, each by a different young European director. The episodes are interconnected by a common thread and the single stories take place in Zagreb, Jerusalem, London, Cologne and Prague.
==Geography== * [[Hive, East Riding of Yorkshire]], England * [[Vestfold University College]] (HÃ¸gskolen i Vestfold, ''HiVe''), a Norwegian university college
==Medicine== * Hives, the non-medical popular language name for [[Urticaria]], a common form of allergic reaction * HIVE, an abbreviation for [[HIV]] (human immunodeficiency virus) encephalitis, used in medical research in mice
==Technology== * Hive, a highest-level logical section in the [[Windows Registry]] * [[HIVE]], an abstract game programming library * [[Apache Hive]], a data warehouse infrastructure built on top of Hadoop
==See also== * [[The Hive (disambiguation)]] * [[Hive mind (disambiguation)]] * [[La Colmena (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}}
